name: debugedit
description:
Debugedit is a set of libraries and programs for creating and editing
debuginfo. It allows you to get build-ids and rewrite DWARF source
paths. Debugedit was originally part of the rpm project, and now exists
as its own separate project and is maintained by RedHat.

dependencies.name: help2man
dependencies.description:
help2man produces simple manual pages from the '--help' and '--version'
output of other commands.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: elfutils
dependencies.description:
elfutils is a collection of various binary tools such as eu-objdump, eu-
readelf, and other utilities that allow you to inspect and manipulate
ELF files. Refer to Table 5.Tools Included in elfutils for Red Hat
Developer for a complete list of binary tools that are distributed with
the Red Hat Developer Toolset version of elfutils.

dependencies.name: libiberty
dependencies.description:
The libiberty.a library from GNU binutils. Libiberty provides demangling
and support functions for the GNU toolchain.
